post.description: Create a zip file from given file URIs and returns the URI for that zip file. Unauthorized or non-existing files will be skipped.

get.description: Returns tasks and subtasks that are related to the `active` personnel
Returns a single task and it's subtasks that is related to the `active` personnel

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system

data.description:
*     Depending on the event type, this object will contain following properties: 
  *     `type == 1` => `{ status_old: int, status_new: int }`,
  *     `type == 2` => `{ title_old: string, title_new: string }`,
  *     `type == 3` => `{ assignee: int }`,
  *     `type == 4` => `{ assignee: int }`,
  *     `type == 5` => `{ description: string }`,
  *     `type == 6` => `{ due_date_old: string(datetime), due_date_new: string(datetime) }`,
  *     `type == 7` => `{ title: string }`,
  *     `type == 8` => `{ title: string }`,
  *     `type == 10` => `{ priority_old: int, priority_new: int }`,
  *     `type == 11` => `{ location: { latitude: string, longitude: string } }`,
  *     `type == 12` => `{ name: string }`,
  *     `type == 13` => `{ name: string }`,
  *     `type == 14` => `{ start_date_old: string(datetime), start_date_new: string(datetime) }`
  *

enabler.description: NULL if event was triggered by the system

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: column. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: row. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

schema.description: `1 = Yap Ruhsat Belgesi`, `2 = Yap Kullanma zni Belgesi`, `3 = Yanan ve Yklan Belgesi`

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: column. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: row. Defaults to: `0 if z is 1` | `1 if z is 2` | `4 if z is 3`

confirmation.description: true if user aggrees to the terms

tax_number.description: can be either a TCNO or a tax number

form.description: Must be of format: { form: { items: [{...}, ...] } }

kvkk.description: true if user aggrees to the terms

get.description: Returns tasks and subtasks that are related to the `active` personnel
Returns a single task and it's subtasks that is related to the `active` personnel

queue.description: null if message is not associated with any queue (a direct message)

oneOf.description: send a custom message using a custom filter
send a templated message using a custom filter
send a custom message using templated filter
send a templated message using templated filter

total.description: number of citizens in the queue both processed and not yet processed

queued.description: number of citizens not yet processed

success_rate.description: number of processed citizens divided by number of successful messages (successful / processed), null if total is 0

completion_rate.description: number of total citizens divided by number of processed messages (processed / total), null if total is 0

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system

remaining_days.description: How many days more must pass before this choice can be choosen. null if wait_for_days is null. 0 if step is complete. wait_for_days if step is not yet activated.

data.description:
*     Depending on the event type, this object will contain following properties: 
  *     `type == 1` => `{ old_step: string (title), new_step: string (title) (null if new step is null) }`,
  *     `type == 2` => `{ subprocedure: string (title), old_step: string (title), new_step: string (title) (null if new step is null) }`,
  *     `type == 3` => `{ old_description: string (first 128 characters), new_description: (first 128 characters) }`,
  *     `type == 4` => `{ step: string (title), comment: string (message) (first 128 characters) }`,
  *     `type == 5` => `{ step: string (title), attachment: string (name) }`
  *

enabler.description: NULL if event was triggered by the system

procedure_type.description:
*    `(Numarataj) Numbering = 1`
 *   `(Yap Ruhsat) BuildingPermit = 2`
 *   `(naat stikamet Rlevesi) ConstructionDirectionSurveying = 3`
 *   `(Kot Kesit Rlevesi) ElevationProfileSurveying = 4`
 *   `(Yola Terk) Expropriation = 5`
 *   `(fraz) Parcelling = 6`
 *   `(Tevhit) Amalgamation = 7`
 *   `(Ecrimisil) OccupationCompensationByManagement = 8`
 *   `(Ecrimisil - Vatanda) OccupationCompensationByCitizen = 9`
 *   `(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi) PlanChange1to5000Internal = 10`
 *   `(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi - Vatanda) PlanChange1to5000External = 11`
 *   `(Ykm Ruhsat) DeconstructionPermit = 12`
 *   `(Avan Proje) PreliminaryDesign = 13`
 *   `(Yazl mar Durumu) WrittenZoningStatus = 14`
 *   `Riskli Yap = 15`
 *   `Kira Yardm (Mal Sahibi) = 16`
 *   `Kira Yardm (Kirac) = 17`
 *   `Test = 18`

procedure_type_parcel.description:
*    `(Numarataj) Numbering = 1`
 *   `(Yap Ruhsat) BuildingPermit = 2`
 *   `(naat stikamet Rlevesi) ConstructionDirectionSurveying = 3`
 *   `(Kot Kesit Rlevesi) ElevationProfileSurveying = 4`
 *   `(Yola Terk) Expropriation = 5`
 *   `(fraz) Parcelling = 6`
 *   `(Tevhit) Amalgamation = 7`
 *   `(Ecrimisil) OccupationCompensationByManagement = 8`
 *   `(Ecrimisil - Vatanda) OccupationCompensationByCitizen = 9`
 *   `(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi) PlanChange1to5000Internal = 10`
 *   `(1/5000 lekli Plan Deiimi - Vatanda) PlanChange1to5000External = 11`
 *   `(Avan Proje) PreliminaryDesign = 13`
 *   `(Yazl mar Durumu) WrittenZoningStatus = 14`
 *   `Test = 18`

procedure_type_structure.description:
*    `(Ykm Ruhsat) DeconstructionPermit = 12`
 *    `Riskli Yap = 15`
 *    `Kira Yardm (Mal Sahibi) = 16`
 *    `Kira Yardm (Kirac) = 17`
 *    `Test = 18`

completed_on.description: null if procedure is not yet complete
null if step is not yet complete

uploader.description: NULL if attachment was added by the system
NULL if attachment was added by the system

parcel_tag_type.description:
Use dot as delimiter to specify subtags. ex: `imar_plani_surecinde`, `imar_plani_surecinde.hazirlik_asamasinda`, `belediye_mulku.kiraya_verilen.bina`. All possible values are as follows:
 *   
 		[
			'imar_plani_surecinde' => [
				'hazirlik_asamasinda',
				'kurum_gorusu_asamasinda',
				'meclis_karari_asamasinda',
				'onay_dagitim_asamasinda',
				'aski_ilan_asamasinda',
				'itiraz_surecinde',
				'dava_surecinde'
			],
			'yeni_yapi' => [
				'on_proje_asamasinda',
				'ruhsat_asamasinda',
				'yapim_asamasinda',
				'iskan_asamasinda'
			],
			'riskli_yapi' => [
				'1999_deprem_hasarli',
				'2000_deprem_hasarli',
				'resen_islem_yapilan',
				'ilgililerince_islem_yapilan',
				'tahliye_edilip_yikilan'
			],
			'belediye_mulku' => [
				'belediyece_kullanilan' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				],
				'kiraya_verilen' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				],
				'tahsis_edilen' => [
					'bina',
					'arsa'
				]
			],
			'ecrimisil' => [],
			'belediyeye_tahsis_edilen_mulk' => [
				'bina',
				'arsa'
			],
			'belediyeye_kiralanan_mulk' => [
				'bina',
				'arsa'
			],
			'kamulastirmaya_konu_mulk' => [],
			'hasarli_bina' => [
				'bosaltilan' => [],
				'bosaltilamayan' => [],
				'deprem_1999' => []
			]
			]
